name: Lost Signal (DailynSastro, crocuscockus, Sjoerd, niklio43)
description:
~Story~

After earth lost signal with their outer space colonies, a rescue mission was in order. They launched their X420 space shuttle in an attempt to find the lost colonies hidden between all the planets and asteroids...

You were assigned the mission to uncover these lost colonies.

~How to play~

Follow the distress signal thats being emitted in space, if the signal gets louder it means you are getting closer. There is also a compass to help you find your way.

Best enjoyed with surround sound audio.

This game was made as an entry to International Educational Game jam 2022.

Credits:
